Projects.title: Projects
Projects.descP1: E-commerce web application for the sale of floors and paints. Created by Ezequiel Martino and Gonzalo Perez for theoretical/practical purposes. Developed with React, JavaScript, Boostrap, HTML/CSS, Kotlin y SpringBoot.
Projects.descP2: Mobile application for parking ramp rental. Created by Ezequiel Martino and Gonzalo Perez for theoretical/practical purposes. Developed with React Native, JavaScript, Kotlin y SpringBoot.

About.desc: Fullstack web developer looking for a first job, especially interested in React development.
About.cardDesc: I'm 21 years old, I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina and I'm about to graduate as a developer from the UNSAM.
About.cardDesc2: I have experience in a team development of web aplications with React and SpringBoot, JavaScript, Kotlin, HTML/CSS and databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, Neo4J, Redis.

Toast.successMsg: I will respond as soon as possible
